name: Cave Escape 3D
description:
Escapist, the cave escape ninja, all alone in a cave surrounded by lava and the only chance of survival is her ability to jump so dang high. Pick up all the coins in each level to advance to the next one, and before long things start getting tricky.

Key Mapping:
Up/Down/Left/Right - Arrow Keys
Jump - Space Bar
Switch Camera Mode - Shift
Quit/Return to Menu/Skip Cinematic - Escape
Next Level - Left Mouse Click
